text:
May 15, 2025

Challenger, Jurong Point

This location is recommended for electronic purchases.  They  offer wireless earbuds, travel adapters, computer accessories, and mobile accessories for Apple, Samsung, and Sony products.  Membership discounts and promotional pricing are currently available.

My wife and I have been on the hunt for an iPhone 15 Pro Max and visited 3 to 4 stores to compare prices.
After some searching, we finally stopped by Challenger at Jurong Point Mall, and Iâ€™m so glad we did! Their price for the iPhone 15 Pro Max was much cheaper than the others we had seen, making it a great deal.
The shopping experience was smooth, and the staff were helpful throughout the process.

Overall, very happy with our purchase.
Highly recommend checking out Challenger for tech products!

I had a great experience thanks to a young guy named David. He was very patient in explaining how to use the phone and helped me find exactly the phone case I was looking for. Super friendly, professional, and helpful. Really appreciate his service!

Went to buy an urgently needed headphone on 10 April 2025, item I wanted was out of stock but the staff was friendly and even kind enough to help me check with the nearest challenger stores if they have the item in stock and reserved it so I can go and collect. Great service and thank you very much lighter blue shirt guy.

Sorry wasn't wearing specs so couldn't see your name tag

Sale person Andy,sale person from Jurong point.I would like to said thank to him ,make extra effort even thot is not his job.trying to make reservation on my x4 product. And he make a call ever outlet for me to check x4 insta 360 available.
